quest.name: Strange Tastes
journal: Guntmar could really use a pick-me-up.
objectives: Slay a muud suud for its horn.
Deliver the muud suud horn to Guntmar.

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: Fancy meeting you here in a place like this. I could actually use a bit of help from a capable adventurer such as yourself.

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: Keeping watch up all by my lonesome is surprisingly tiresome work. Lately I haven't been able to keep focused, and I nod off at the strangest times of the day.

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: If you could bring me a single horn from the muud suuds over near Goodblade, it would help me immensely.

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: All I need is a single horn from the muud suuds around Goodblade. Should prove easy for an adventurer like you, right?

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: Did you have any trouble getting the horn?

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: Perfect. This is just what I needed to put the spring back in my step.

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: I was initially assigned to this post because of a passing familiarity with the land, but I've a few other tricks most folks don't know about. Like grinding these horns into a powder, then mixing it in boiling water. It's good for you, and has a kick that really wakes you up.

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: You know, with so few resources to get by on here in the mountains, it sometimes amazes me how we've managed to survive as long as we have. I suppose you could say it's a testament to the value of the knowledge and skills our forebears have passed down through the generations.

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: Ahem. Sorry about that. It's been so long since I've had anyone to talk to up here. Thanks again for your help.

obj.n: For the Living and the Dead
